Title: The Fall of Railton FC
Plot: When Ash finds out that the local football club where he grew up has gone bust and closed down, he suggests the Hustle gang should tackle the greed that has taken over the great game, as the drama continues. Of course, the team stand to make loads of cash in the process! When Ash has an accident and develops a rare condition that means he can't lie, it looks like it won't just be the con that's over but Ash's days as a grifter as well. GuestStars: David Harewood, Dimitri Leonidas, Gemma Arrowsmith, Scott McNess, Daniel Kirrane
